div.ab:
بســم اللّه الرّحمن الرّحــيم
شهد شهود هذا الكتاب أن موسى بن عبد اللّه لقبه
بجوش نخوس أقر عنــدهم وأشــهدهــم على نفسه أن لسليم
مولى أبرك عليه سدس دينر مثقال دينا لازما
له يدفع إليه في إبيبــه قيراطين وفي مسرى
قيراطين يشهد عبد اللّه بن محمّد على ما في هذا الصّك
‮و كــبپــسهدپه پحطه ڤى دى الححه سپه
شهد إسمعيل بن قادم يكنّا أبا الحسن على مثل ما شهد به عبد اللّه
بن محمّد حرف بحرف وكتب شهادته بخطّه
وشهد وليد بن عبد اللّه وكتب عنه عبد اللّه بن محمّد
بأمره وبمخطره وعبد الجبّار بن سهل على ما في هذا الكتاب
‮ويعقوب بن إبرهيم على ما فــي هذا الكتاب ‪σλϝ‬
وكفا باللّه شهيدا ومحمّد بن يعقوب
على ما في هذا الكتاب وكفا باللّه شهيدا

bi smi ăl lāhi ăr raḥmāni ăr raḥīmi
šahida šuhūdu hāḏā ăl kitābi ʾanna mūsà bna ʿabdi ăl lāhi laqabu hu
biǧūšu naḫūsu ʾaqarra ʿinda hum wa ʾašhada hum ʿalà nafsi hi ʾanna li salīm:in
mawlà ʾabraka ʿalay hi sudsa dīnār:in miṯqāl:in dayn:an lāzim:an
la hu yadfaʿu ʾilay hi fī ʾabībha qīrāṭayni wa fī misrà
qīrāṭayni yašhadu ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu muḥammad:in ʿalà mā fī hāḏā ăṣ ṣakki
wa kataba šahādaẗa hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi fī ḏī ăl ḥiǧǧaẗi sanaẗa 236
šahida ʾismāʿīlu bnu qādim:in yukannā ʾabā ăl ḥasani ʿalà miṯli mā šahida bi hi ʿabdu ăl lāhi
bnu muḥammad:in ḥarf bi ḥarf:in wa kataba šahādata hu bi ḫaṭṭi hi
wa šahida walīdu bnu ʿabdi ăl lāhi wa kataba ʿan hu ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu muḥammad:in
bi ʾamri hi wa bi maḫṭari hi wa ʿabdu ăl ǧabbāri bnu sahl:in ʿalà mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi
wa yaʿqūbu bnu ʾibrāhīma ʿalà mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi 236
wa kafā bi ăl lāhi šahīd:an wa muḥammadu bnu yaʿqūba
ʿalà mā fī hāḏā ăl kitābi wa kafā bi ăl lāhi šahīd:an

Au no[m] de Dieu clément et mi[sé]ricordieux! In the name of God, the Compassionate, the Merciful.
Les témoins de ce document [ont témoigné] que Mūsā Ibn ʿAbd Allāh, surnommé The witnesses of this deed have testified, that Mûsâ b. ʿAbdallâh, bynamed
Beǧōš, a reconnu[e]n leur présence et l[es] a pris à té[moins] qu’il doit à Salīm, Beǧôs, has acknowledged in their presence and has called them to witness as to his obligation, that he owes to Salîm,
freedman of Abrak, a sixth of a dînâr miṯqâlî, in form of an obligatory debt l’affranchi d’Abrak, un sixième de dīnār pesé en miṯqāl, et ceci comme dette obligatoire
envers lui; il lui paiera au mois d’épiph[i] deux carats, et au mois de mésori to his (the creditors) credit, (so that) he shall pay to him in Epiphi two carats and in Mesori
deux carats. ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad Ibn ʿAlī est témoin de ce qui est dans cette obligation, two carats. ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad is witness to the tenor of this bill,
and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting in Ḏu'l-Ḥiǧǧa of the year 236. et il écrivit son témoignage de sa main en ḏū l-ḥiǧǧa de l’an 236.
A témoigné Ismāʿīl Ibn Qādim, surnommé Abū l-Ḥasan, de la même chose de lquelle a témoigné ʿAbd Allāh Ismaʿîl b. Qâdim, surnamed Abuʾl-Ḥasan, is witness to the same that ʿAbdallâh
b. Muḥammad has testified word by word, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting. Ibn Muḥammad mot à mot, et il écrivit son témoignage de sa main.
And Walîd b. ʿAbdallâh is witness, and ʿAbdallâh b. Muḥammad has written for him Ont témoigné aussi Walīd Ibn ʿAbd Allāh, et ʿAbd Allāh Ibn Muḥammad écrivit à sa place
at his order and in his presence. And ʿAbd al-Ǧabbâr b. Sahl (has testified) to the tenor of this dee[d] 236. sur son ordre et en sa présence, et ʿAbd al-Ǧabbār Ibn Sahl de tout le contenu de ce documen[t],
And Yaʿqûb b. Ibrahîm is witness to the tenor of this deed, et Yaʿqūb Ibn Ibrāhīm de tout le contenu de ce document, 236,
and God suffices as witness. And Muḥammad b. Yaʿqûb et Dieu suffit comme témoin, et Muḥammad Ibn Yaʿqūb
de tout le contenu de ce document, et Dieu suffit comme témoin. (has testified) to the tenor of this deed, and God suffices as witness.
